Package de.fhe.ai.model

Class Line

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.model.ModelBase
de.fhe.ai.model.Line
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemporaryLine
public class Line
extends ModelBase
A class that represents a path taken by a Tram

  • Constructor Details

    • Line

      public Line​(int id, EventManager eventManager, TrafficManager trafficManager, java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Traversable> route)
      Initializes a new Line
      Parameters:
      id - the internal id of the line
      eventManager - the eventManager used to communicate with the TrafficManager, must be non-null
      name - the name of the line, must be non-null, can be empty
      route - the route of the line, must be non-null, contain at least 3 elements and lead from Station to Station
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid arguments are passed

      public java.lang.String getName()

      public java.util.List<Traversable> getRoute()

    • isTramAllowed

      public boolean isTramAllowed​(Tram tram)
      Checks whether the given tram is allowed to traverse this line completely
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to check traversability for
      Returns:
      true if this tram is allowed to traverse all traversables of this line; otherwise false
